content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(12.93, 10.71)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity group (position 12.93, 10.71) - Status: NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) - Status: WORKING
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS

### Lab at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 10.5, 10.5) - Status: NO_POWER

### Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, 0.5) - Status: NORMAL

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to access entities that do not exist
- Ensure that the entity type you are trying to access exists at the specified position. For example, the error occurred when trying to get the lab at position (6.0, 0.0) where no lab was found.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Errors related to power supply
- Check that all entities requiring power are correctly connected to the electric network to avoid statuses like NO_POWER or NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK.
